member.name: T:ewApps.Shipment.Entity.Role
member.summary: A user role is a customizable set of rights and privileges. Two roles are pre-defined in the system and cannot be edited or deleted i.e. Administrator and System Administrator. Role table contains different user role (rights and privileges) for users. System role will be identified by system field in role table.
member.remarks:
Following fields are mandatory:
RoleId (System generated)
Name
Active
CreatedBy
CreatedDate
ModifiedBy
ModifiedDate
TenantId
ApplicationId

member.name: P:ewApps.Shipment.Entity.Role.RoleName
member.summary: Name of the role admin for admin else ID which is a guid.

member.name: P:ewApps.Shipment.Entity.Role.RoleKey
member.summary: Admin for admin else same as name.

member.name: P:ewApps.Shipment.Entity.Role.PermissionBitMask
member.summary: PermissionBitMask is integer value set of all the permission of the users.

member.name: P:ewApps.Shipment.Entity.Role.Active
member.summary: Active inactive status of the role.

member.name: P:ewApps.Shipment.Entity.Role.UserType
member.summary: Defines the portal to which this role belongs.

member.name: P:ewApps.Shipment.Entity.Role.TenantId
member.summary: Tenant identifier of the role this column is not required in this table beacause role is a master table does not belong to a particular tenant.

member.name: T:ewApps.Shipment.Entity.RoleLinking
member.summary: It contains linking between User and Role.
member.remarks:
Following fields are mandatory:
RoleLinkingId [System Generated]
UserId
RolePermissionId

member.name: P:ewApps.Shipment.Entity.RoleLinking.TenantUserId
member.summary: App user for which this role linking belongs to .
